AlertDefinition.name: kafka_consumer_group_alerting
AlertDefinition.label: Kafka Consumer Group Alerting
AlertDefinition.description: This alert is triggered if a consumer groups lag on a Kafka topic goes above a threshold.

parameters.name: topic_pattern
parameters.description: Topic name pattern to filter on

parameters.name: zk_quorum
parameters.description: Comma separated zookeeper addresses of cluster

parameters.name: consumer_group
parameters.description: The Consumer Group to monitor that is used by Mirrormaker

parameters.name: lag_tolerance
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages the Consumer can lag behind on the topic

parameters.name: kafka_lib
parameters.description: Optional Kafka lib to prepend to classpath
